price: Akitaka, huutuliza upepo navyo hivyo vyombo husimama tutwe juu ya bahari. Hakika katika hayo zipo Ishara kwa kila mwenye kusubiri akashukuru.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُسۡكِنِ ٱلرِّيحَ فَيَظۡلَلۡنَ رَوَاكِدَ عَلَىٰ ظَهۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٍ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akipenda huutuliza upepo kukawa shuwari; basi majahazi yaliyo thibiti juu ya bahari hutulia hayendi huko yendako. Hakika huko kwenda kwao na kusimama kwao kwa amri ya Mwenyezi Mungu ni dalili wazi juu ya uweza wa Mwenyezi Mungu. Wanayazingatia hayo Waumini wenye kusubiri wakati wa dhiki, na wenye kushukuru wakati wa furaha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in yasha yus'kini al-rīḥa fayaẓlalna rawākida ʿalā ẓahrihi inna fī dhālika laāyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūrin
translations: He can cause the wind to become still
He can cause the wind to become still
